ygData.subject: Re: Bases and Quasar
ygData.msgSnippet: Megaton had finished the Data that Megatron had given him, he was on his way to report when he heard Black Arachnia and Megatron talking. he entered the room

Megaton had finished the Data that Megatron had given him, he was on his way
to report when he heard Black Arachnia and Megatron talking. he entered the
room still in his awkward odd looking bot form. "What is the reason that I,
one of your combat generals was not informed of this meeting?" He lowered
his head so that he was eye level with Megatron. "If I am to act effectively
in the role you have placed me in I need to be kept informed." He walked
around the room to keep the scene fresh and unpredictable, placing his arms
behind his wings as he walked. "I have decided that assaulting the Maximals
would be a strategic mistake. There are more of them than there are of us at
the moment so it would be a good idea to place thier agressions against the
other faction of Predacons. The Maximals are currently hurting so they'd be
a low risk of turning against us. If they did we could crush them."
----- Original Message -----
From: <JP3884@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 14, 2001 7:12 AM
Subject: Re: Bases and Quasar


>     Megatron stepped out of the CR chamber, he was the last to go in and
now
> his troops looked to him for the next move. Hell Beast, who was still a
bit
> ill, slept mostly.
>     "According to this screen Megatron, Killfests team is held up here."
> Black Aracnia said. She stood before the viewscreen displaying the battle
> area. "I believe is used to be yours and Kitkats former base."
>     Megatron thought a moment. Wht the hell would Killfest go to that
heap?
> It was decimated, destroyed. Surely he couldnt hope to settle himself and
his
> forces there. But, prehaps he had a trick up his sleeve. Mabey he was
looking
> for something....mabey Megatron missed something very important that
Killfest
> knew about.
>     "Hmm, very interesting indeed. Mabey we shall put off the attack on
the
> Maximals and hit Killfest and his men agian. Here." He pointed one large
> transmetal purple finger to the rock quarry to the east of the cave.
>     "If we got them there, we could finish them alomst." Tarantulas said,
> from behinde a computer terminal. "But dont you think Killfest would be
> expecting us?"
>     Megatron did take that into consideration. Killfest was clever, but he
> and his men were damaged. Megatrons men had the advantage of being
repaired.
> If they did strike Killfest, Megatron and his men would have the upper
hand.
>     "I want to scout it out first. Nighteyes, and Waspinator, you will go
and
> send back any images you record." Megatron said, turing to them.
>     Nighteyes bowed her panther head. "If Megatron says it, it is to be
done.
> I will go."
>     Waspinator buzzed over to Megatron and began to praise his leader for
> such an important task. Megatron swatted them away and sent them to see
what
> Killfest was up to. ...And if they were spotted, and Killfest did open
fire,
> Megatron guessed he woul;d have no choice but to engage him agian. And
after
> that, agian, and agian, and agian.
>
>     Ominous watched his four troops enter the Orb. For now Quasar was in
the
> ship. She wouldnt get far, not in the Ord. It was like a giant energon
> reactor, one wrong move and she could vaporize herself.
>     "Putnam, where is Darkmouse?" He demanded, slamming his fist agianst a
> small side table. His tone of voice was angry.
>     Putnam held out his arms in defeat. "They alluded us sir. Once we
repair,
> we shall go back. Mabey, under your leadership?" He said.
>     Ominous waved them away in disgust, away to the Energon CR Chambers.
He
> supposed he would need to lead them into battle next time. ut, for now, he
> was going to get that little arachnid Quasar.
>
>
>
